name: aun-subscreen
description: Just for 'subscreen', which gives a timeline view of tweets and IRC messages.

MESSAGES_LIMIT.description: Heroku Postgres Dev database can keep only 10,000 rows, say, 9,500 will be reasonable value including margin.

TWITTER_AUTH.description: Credentials for Twitter. Tokens should be concatenated with ':'. from https://apps.twitter.com/ like: '[Consumer key]:[Consumer secret]:[Access token]:[Access token secret]'

TWITTER_QUERY.description: Comma separated queries tracking from Twitter like: 'heroku,ruby'

IRC_SERVER.description: Hostname of the IRC server like: 'irc.example.com'

IRC_PORT.description: Port number of the IRC server (default: 6667)

IRC_CHANNELS.description: Comma separated IRC channel names receiving messages like: '#test1,#test2'

TWITTER_EXCLUDE_REGEXP.description: Regexp to exclude tweets from screen like '^RT'

TWITTER_EXCLUDE_SCREEN_NAME.description: Comma separated sccreen names on Twitter excluding from screen
